Title: A Concerned Friend
Description:
Ah, $n, there you are! Great Kyron was asking after you and your friend Anduin. 

I think they want to talk to you about Faerin. Nothing urgent mind you, she probably just needs some good company. But we're all a bit worried about her.

Check in with Kyron when you have a moment, will you?
RewardText: I hope the journey wasn't long.
